message: A-Najma Square in Rafah - one of the bustling meeting places of the city: before and after.

The Palestinians report the activity of forces and heavy weapons of the IDF in the area of ​​the Abu Said junction, in the Saudi neighborhood in the west of the city of Rafah in the southern Gaza Strip.
The correspondent of the Lebanese Al-Manar channel, Ali Shoeib claims: The Israeli soldiers started the fires in southern Lebanon with these means.
Saudi Minister of Hajj: About 1.83 million pilgrims came this year to observe the Hajj in Mecca.

The military arm of the Islamic Jihad Syrian branch announces the death of one of its operatives, Muhammad Jalbut (45 years old), in southern Lebanon.

Apparently this is the Palestinian who was killed in the motorcycle attack in southern Lebanon, earlier today.
Palestinian channels report continued exchange of fire between IDF forces and Hamas operatives at this time in the Tel a-Saltan area in west Rafah.

The Lebanese Al Mayadeen channel reported this morning on the expansion of the IDF operation in the Tel a-Saltan neighborhood and the Saudi neighborhood in western Rafah.
There are reports of fire from the air, sea and land in this area.
Lebanese channels publish documentation of the destruction in the town of Naqoura in southern Lebanon as a result of IDF attacks.

The faction of the resistance committees in Gaza reacts to the report on the dismantling of the American floating dock 👆:
The dismantling of the American jetty a week after the massacre in Nuseirat (referring to the Palestinian deaths in the operation to release the hostages - AA) reveals the despicable security and intelligence role of the jetty as an American Zionist intelligence security base whose purpose was to help the Zionist enemy carry out the massacre in Nuseirat.
"Gazan Innovation": a special faucet for the tent

Following the report by Hezbollah 👆

IDF: Following the sirens that sounded regarding a hostile aircraft infiltration in northern Israel at 12:56, several aerial targets were identified crossing from Lebanon into Israeli territory and falling in the area of Goren in northern Israel. No injuries were reported. As a result, a fire broke out in the area. The incident is under review.
The destruction in the area of ​​al Farouq Mosque in the Shabura neighborhood in the center of Rafah, in the southern Gaza Strip.

Hezbollah accepts responsibility for the suicide drone attack on the Khirbet Ma'ar base, of the artillery battalion headquarters, in response to the attack in Jouaiyya three days ago in which the senior Hezbollah commander Taleb Abdullah was eliminated.

###
A relatively long revenge...

Hezbollah published photos from the past of Taleb Abdullah, the senior commander who was killed this week in an IDF attack in Jouaiyya in southern Lebanon.
In the attached photos you can see certificates of appreciation that Nasrallah gave him for his work, as indicated by Hezbollah a few days ago 👆.

The Palestinians report 19 dead and more than 50 wounded in the attack last night on three houses (homes of the Jamasi, Ramlawi and HatHat families) between the Tafah neighborhood and Shejaya neighborhood in Gaza City.

"Day of Arafah"
Since the morning hours hundreds of thousands of pilgrims began to flow to Mount Arafah in Mecca, where they are expected to stay today, in the heavy heat (49 degrees in the shade and a ground temperature of more than 70 degrees), as an essential part of fulfilling the Hajj pillar which every Muslim must do at least once in his life.

The day of Arafah is a day of fasting and forgiveness of sins, a day when "the gates of heaven are opened" according to the Muslim faith.

On the occasion of this day, the spokesman for the military wing of Hamas, Abu Obaida, tweeted this morning a special tweet in which he called on the pilgrims in Mecca to pray for their brothers in Gaza who are fighting to free "the third holiest place for Islam - al-Aqsa Mosque".
The Shifa hospital complex in Gaza City before and after in a satellite image.
American officials told CBS: Our interpretation of the recent Israeli strikes inside Lebanon is that they are preparing the battlefield for a sweeping attack.

The Lebanese Al-Akhbar channel, which is affiliated with Hezbollah, publishes that the Americans are waiting for Israel to finish the operation in Rafah in order to try to revive the negotiations for a deal.
According to expectations, the operation in Rafah is expected to be completed within two weeks.

US Central Command:
The Greek ship M/V tutor that was hit by missiles fired by the Houthis on 12.6 began to sink.
The ship was abandoned by the crew. One of the crew is still missing since the ship was hit.

In another Houthi attack, the Polish ship M/V Verbena was damaged.
One of her crew members was seriously injured.

US Central Command: The American floating dock in Gaza will be temporarily dismantled and moved to Ashdod port due to weather conditions.

Since it was installed on May 17, 3,500 tons of aid have been brought into the Strip through it (this is equivalent to about 175 trucks entering by land. There were days during the war when more entered through the Rafah crossing in one day than the floating dock brought in in a month).
South Lebanon: The residents of the village of Sheba announced tonight that they lost control of the fire near their village. They call for immediate assistance from the Lebanese rescue agencies
Lebanese channels report that a Palestinian was killed and wounded in an Israeli drone attack on a motorcycle between Aitaroun and Bint Jabil in southern Lebanon.
